testcase.name: The bonusForProductsSold method returns the right result
The finalSalary method returns the correct result capped at maximum salary
The finalSalary method returns the regular salary without multiplier and bonus
The bonusMultiplier method returns 10 when productsSold is below the threshold
The bonusMultiplier method returns 13 when productsSold is equal to the threshold
The bonusMultiplier method returns 13 when productsSold is above the threshold
The salaryMultiplier method returns 1.0 when daysSkipped is below the threshold
The salaryMultiplier method returns 0.85 when daysSkipped is equal to the threshold
The bonusMultiplier method returns 0.85 when daysSkipped is above the threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped above threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped and productsSold below threshold
